item.description:
Join Beverly Hutchinson McNeff and the staff of Miracle Distribution Center for a weekend experience with A Course in Miracles in East Hartford, Connecticut.

"The Course offers us a way to be in the world but not of it. It is a gentle path to the experience of peace, wherever we may find ourselves. With all that is happening in the world right now, it is time for us to become miracle workers! The Course offers us a path to do just that. This weekend with Beverly will share understanding and insight into the Course to inspire newcomers as well as longtime students. "


* DATES: April 9-10, 2010
* TIMES: Friday 7 p.m. to 9 p.m., Saturday 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
* COST: $125.00. Register 4 people and a 5th person comes for free!
* REGISTER ONLINE HERE or call 1-800-359-2246
* LOCATION:
o Holiday Inn East Hartford
o 363 Roberts Street
o East Hartford, CT 06108
o Directions to the Hotel

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group
